attributes.action: Scrap congestion charge on private hire drivers in London and say no to it.
attributes.additional_details:
As i am  private hire driver for over 10 years and earning my living out of this .As it is we are struggling to survive  and working in a cut throat market .Instead of helping over sixty thousand drivers tfl a pull a new stunt to discriminate towards private hire drivers which unjust and totally unfair and we not going to go quite on this !
this is another way of to make money out hard working private hire drivers who are serving better then competitors in the market for fraction of the cost!
attributes.background: Further to new legislation being reviewed to charge private hire drivers congestion charge it is completely unfair and unjust, As its not drivers fault as they are providing a public service to millions of Londoners  further more TfL shouldn't have issued so many licenses at the first place.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. The London congestion charge is the responsibility of the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
